summary: A German journalist is saddled with a nine-year-old girl after encountering her mother at a New York airport.
cast: Rüdiger Vogler|Yella Rottländer|Lisa Kreuzer|Edda Köchl|Ernest Boehm|Sam Presti|Lois Moran|Didi Petrikat|Hans Hirschmüller|Sibylle Baier|Mirko|Julia Baier|Chuck Berry|Peter Genée|Peter Handke|Jane Jarvis|Micky Kley|Martin Müller|Joachim von Mengershausen|Wim Wenders
title: Alicia en las ciudades
